source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(ModifiedDate) as maxDate from saleslt.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from saleslt.customer where
ModifiedDate > '@{activity('HIGH WATERMARK').output.firstRow.Prop_0}'
and 	
ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('LAST MODIFIED DATETIME').output.firstRow.maxDate}'

scriptLines: leftJoinCSVvsSQL derive(hash_changed = iif(isNull(rightID), true(), hashColumn1 != hashColumn2)) ~> FlagChanges
